Header: Defender driver of hit-and-run case enlarged on bail
Content: The driver of the defender jeep who was involved in an accident that killed a Borella Traffic OIC last month has been released on bail. He has been released on two surety bails of 500,000 rupees each. The Colombo Magistrateâ€™s Court delivered this order when the suspect Navindu Omesh Ratnayake, was produced before the court today. Meanwhile, police informed court that the Attorney General has issued directives to file a case against the suspect at the High Court for violating Section 298 of the Penal Code. Accordingly, the magistrate announced that the case would be taken up for further hearing on April 22nd. Eight other suspects who were involved in the incident, were also issued orders to be present before courts at the next hearing.
